Texts.Chs: 把^orange;一份肥料^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Fertilizer^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Now you can create some more advanced chemicals, and grow even better crops! Upgrade your ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; into a ^green;Chemistry Lab^reset; as soon as you are able.

^orange;Fertilizer^white; is essential to produce plants of any real value. To make some, you will first need an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset;. ^green;I need one barrel of fertilizer^reset; for this project. Bring me some, would you?
